hero.title: Streamline Your Document Workflow
hero.subtitle: Sign, send, and manage documents with the world's most trusted e-signature platform.
hero.descriptionText: Experience seamless document management with our secure, user-friendly platform designed for modern businesses.
hero.mainTitle: E-Signatures Made Simple for Growing Teams
hero.mainSubtitle: From contracts to NDAs, sign and send documents with just a few clicks—no technical setup required.
hero.secondaryTitle: A 10x better signing experience. Faster, smarter and more beautiful.

HeroSection.title: Secure Electronic Signatures for Modern Businesses
HeroSection.description: Sign, send, and manage documents digitally with ease. Streamline your workflows and go paperless.

FeaturesSection.title: Key Features
FeaturesSection.description: Discover how WatiqaSign can transform your document workflows.
FeaturesSection.feature1Description: Legally binding e-signatures with advanced encryption and audit trails.
FeaturesSection.feature2Description: Automate document routing, approvals, and notifications for faster processes.
FeaturesSection.feature3Description: Seamlessly integrate with popular cloud storage providers like Google Drive and Dropbox.
FeaturesSection.feature4Description: Sign documents on the go from any device, anytime, anywhere.
FeaturesSection.feature5Description: Create and reuse document templates to standardize your signing processes.
FeaturesSection.feature6Description: Monitor document status and activity with real-time notifications and dashboards.

EcologicalSavingsSimple.title: Our Environmental Impact
EcologicalSavingsSimple.description: By choosing WatiqaSign, you're contributing to a greener planet. See the positive impact we've made together.
EcologicalSavingsSimple.paperSavedDescription: Equivalent to thousands of sheets of paper.
EcologicalSavingsSimple.treesSavedDescription: Protecting our forests, one signature at a time.
EcologicalSavingsSimple.wasteReducedDescription: Minimizing landfill waste from paper documents.

EcologicalCalculator.title: Calculate Your Ecological Savings
EcologicalCalculator.description: See how much environmental impact you can save by going paperless with WatiqaSign.

BenefitsSection.title: Why Choose WatiqaSign?
BenefitsSection.description: Experience the benefits of a truly digital and efficient signing process.
BenefitsSection.benefit1Description: Accelerate your business processes with rapid document turnaround times.
BenefitsSection.benefit2Description: Facilitate seamless teamwork with shared documents and real-time updates.
BenefitsSection.benefit3Description: Protect your sensitive data with industry-leading encryption and compliance.
BenefitsSection.efficiencyDescription: Accelerate your business processes with rapid document turnaround times.
BenefitsSection.collaborationDescription: Facilitate seamless teamwork with shared documents and real-time updates.
BenefitsSection.securityDescription: Protect your sensitive data with industry-leading encryption and compliance.
BenefitsSection.speedDescription: Get documents signed and returned in minutes, not days.

PricingSection.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
PricingSection.description: Choose the plan that best fits your needs, from individual users to large enterprises.
PricingSection.plan1Description: Perfect for individuals and small teams getting started with digital signatures.
PricingSection.plan2Description: Ideal for growing businesses that need advanced features and unlimited documents.
PricingSection.plan3Description: Comprehensive solution for large organizations with custom requirements.

TermsPage.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsPage.introduction: Welcome to WatiqaSign! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of WatiqaSign's Website, located at [Your Website URL].
TermsPage.acceptance: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use WatiqaSign if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
TermsPage.cookiesContent: The website uses cookies to help personalize your online experience. By accessing WatiqaSign, you agreed to use the required cookies.
TermsPage.licenseContent: Unless otherwise stated, WatiqaSign and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on WatiqaSign. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from WatiqaSign for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.
TermsPage.sell: Sell, rent or sub-license material from WatiqaSign
TermsPage.reproduce: Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from WatiqaSign
TermsPage.thisAgreement: This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof.
TermsPage.partsOfThisWebsite: Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. WatiqaSign does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of WatiqaSign,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who posts their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, WatiqaSign shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.
TermsPage.organizationsMayLink: The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:
TermsPage.onlineDirectoryDistributors: Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and
TermsPage.systemWideBusinesses: System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.
TermsPage.theseOrganizationsMayLink: These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.
TermsPage.weMayConsider: We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations:
TermsPage.commonlyKnown: commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources;
TermsPage.associations: associations or other groups representing charities;
TermsPage.accountingLaw: accounting, law and consulting firms; and
TermsPage.weWillApprove: We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of WatiqaSign; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.
TermsPage.ifYouAreOne: If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to WatiqaSign. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response.
TermsPage.approvedOrganizations: Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows:
TermsPage.byUseOfOur: By use of our corporate name; or
TermsPage.byUseOfUniform: By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or
TermsPage.byUseOfAnyOther: By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking party’s site.
TermsPage.noUseOfWatiqaSign: No use of WatiqaSign's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement.
TermsPage.withoutPriorApproval: Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.
TermsPage.weShallNotBeHeld: We shall not be held responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that are raised on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.
TermsPage.weReserveTheRight: We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it’s linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.
TermsPage.removalOfLinks: Removal of links from our website
TermsPage.ifYouFind: If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.
TermsPage.weDoNotEnsure: We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date.
TermsPage.toTheMaximum: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:
TermsPage.limitOrExclude: limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury;
TermsPage.limitOrExcludeFraud: limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation;
TermsPage.limitAnyOfOur: limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or
TermsPage.excludeAnyOfOur: exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law.
TermsPage.theLimitations: The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.
TermsPage.asLongAs: As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature.
